channel.title: How to make a command that banns some1 if they do noclip?
channel.description: can some1 tell me the code for that command..also to make it say "player name is doin noclip report to admin" thx

item.title: How to make a command that banns some1 if they do noclip?
item.dc:creator: @zilchuary zilchuary
item.description:
@zilchuary wrote:

[code]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“noclip”)){
appendToBanned(playerName);

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" Has been banned from this server!";
}[/code]

There you go
add that with all you’r commands.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a command that banns some1 if they do noclip?
